channel.title: Lagex is looking for a hoster!
channel.description:
Dear Readers,
Lagex is proud to tell you that our website, and forums are nearly done, and our coding is completely finished...The only problem is...We need someone to host it (So people can play.). If you can host and code, you will get a Lagex Staff crown. If you can't do the coding, but can host, we will give you a moderator to begin with. If we see that you've been a reliable hoster, we will make you a part of the Lagex Staff, and a Community Member. If willing, please add our messengers....
Ruinscape@live.com/MSN/HOTMAIL/LIVE
Ruinscapegame@yahoo.com/YAHOO
################################################################################################ Also, we are going to be holding a massive random drop(Just like RS). If you can host, you must be able to start straight away, so please keep that in mind...We appreciate your time...
Sincerely,
~Lagex

item.title: Lagex is looking for a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @DarkProject DarkProject
item.description:
@DarkProject wrote:

Ok… Runer King, one question, I’m kind of with the others on the pay for members thing, it’s just that nobody pays $6 to do something that is easily done free. My advice is get the price down to $1, it’s not much but if the server is really good and if the membership price is low, people just might pay, because it is an amount that’s made easy. And I would be glad to host, except the fact is that I need to get a router to portfoward, which I haven’t figured out exactly what it does yet… noob face But I CAN do No-IP, but not sure if I gotta make people use ham, so… Anyway, that’s all I have to say…

Read full topic
item.source: Lagex is looking for a hoster!

item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

I think most people would prefer not to pay, and instead do something better with the $6 they save a month.
Lol.

That or go on a better server.
There are TONS of them.

Ummm…Leave? You aren’t helping.
And if you keep posting, I will call tom aka Ikiliki

I think I know what you’re going to say, too. And btw, I am a retard! So STFU

REPORETED 4 BAD OPINOIN “<Learn how to spell dude…”

Anyways, you have nothing to bug ikiliki about.[/quote]

item.title: Lagex is looking for a hoster!
item.dc:creator: @Chemical1 Chemical
item.description:
@Chemical1 wrote:

A_Ninja:

Who would want to pay for membership on a private runescape game when they can play actual runescape for less?

We offer membership for 60 days on just 5.00…Plus, easier rares (All staff get to spawn their own rares.)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 30, 2007, 07:23:09 PM[/size][hr][quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:9, topic:161711”][quote author=Burkey link=topic=220051.msg1907315#msg1907315 date=1196490012]
Bah, Sounds Shady, What Are The Odds I’m Actually Getting Paid.

About zero to one.

Who would want to pay for membership on a private runescape game when they can play actual runescape for less?

Whoa, wait…
How much are you charging these guys a month?[/quote]

you DO know you will make about 0.00$ a month. Noone will buy membership. unless its as good as dodian.
